Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Treatment of Genetic Screening of Hypertriglyceridemia type I, III, and V - HTG Amsterdam
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Treatment of genetic screening of hypertriglyceridemia type I, III, and V - HTG Amsterdam
Configuration.Description: This is a cohort of patients with extreme hypertriglyceridemia. Patients have been screened for loss of function mutations in LPL, GPIHBP1, APOC2, APOA5 and LMF1.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Inclusion:
  • See Surendran RP et al., J Inte Med, 2012
  • TG >10 mmol/l

    Exclusion:
  • ApoE2E2
  • Alcohol abuse
  • Uncontrolled diabetes

Configuration.StudyHistory: This is a cohort collected at the outpatient clinic of the AMC. Patients have been collected in the past 15 years.
